title: Is it feasible to bypass ROS entirely and use Ignition Transport API directly instead?

content.raw: I’m having some issues with ROS infrastructure stability and I don’t really need ROS for my solution. I wonder if I could bypass ROS entirely and use Ignition API directly instead. SubT CloudSim Architecture diagram shows Ignition Transport being used between Gazebo and Robot instances, which hints at a possibility of using Ignition Transport API directly. How feasible is it? I would be willing to try it, even if there is no official support, as long as I can submit solutions without ROS being used.
